00038    template <typename Data>
00039    class ArrayIterator
00040    {
00041 
00042    public:
00043 
00049       ArrayIterator()
00050        : current_(0),
00051          end_(0)
00052       {}
00053 
00059       void setCurrent(Data *ptr)
00060       {  current_ = ptr; }
00061 
00067       void setEnd(Data *ptr)
00068       {  end_ = ptr; }
00069 
00075       bool atEnd() const
00076       {  return (current_ == end_); }
00077 
00083       bool notEnd() const
00084       {  return (current_ != end_); }
00085 
00091       Data* get() const
00092       {  return current_; }
00093 
00095 
00096       
00102       Data& operator* () const
00103       {  return *current_; }
00104 
00110       Data* operator -> () const
00111       {  return current_; }
00112 
00118       ArrayIterator<Data>& operator++ ()
00119       {
00120          ++current_;
00121          return *this;
00122       }
00123 
00125       
00126    private:
00127 
00129       Data* current_;
00130 
00132       Data* end_;
00133 
00134    }; 
00135 
00136 }
